roleset.name: to set apart

role.descr: entity that patient was isolated from

example.name: transitive
example.text: Immunex Corp. said [0] its scientists isolated a molecule which may hold potential as a treatment for disruptions of the immune-system , ranging from organ-transplant rejection , to allergies and asthma .
example.arg: a molecule which may hold potential as a treatment for disruptions of the immune-system , ranging from organ-transplant rejection , to allergies and asthma

example.name: isolate from
example.text: Even today , [the animals]-1 are isolated [*-1] from human interference as tourism here is restricted.

roleset.note: Member of Vncls concealment-16, classify-29.10. Checked by Julia, 10/2010.

example.name: with GOL
example.text: So he isolated them into small spaces the size of a crate, but still they stayed alive.
example.arg: into small spaces the size of a crate
